title: Blanc AI
description: Blanc AI helps enterprise construction teams eliminate the headache of manual quoting, so they can focus on the real work. Construction teams waste hours on estimates—an unpaid, time-consuming process that slows down operations. Blanc AI automates quoting, streamlines takeoffs, and simplifies material sourcing, making it faster and easier to generate accurate estimates. Our platform integrates seamlessly into existing workflows, to spend less time on paperwork and more time building.
